content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you with your HVAC needs today?
Hi, I think my AC isn't working properly and I wanted to get it checked.
Iâ€™m sorry to hear that! Could you please provide your name so I can assist you further?
Thanks, Sarah. Could you please provide your address so I can confirm that we're servicing your area?
Thank you! Let me check if we're able to service that location.
Good news, we do serve your area. When would be an ideal time for us to send a technician?
Actually, I'm moving soon, so I don't think it makes sense to schedule a repair right now.
I completely understand, Sarah. Moving can be hectic and costly. If you need any HVAC services in the future, please don't hesitate to contact us. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
reason: Customer is moving soon and declined to schedule appointment
